articles.author: Adam Wren
articles.title: Mike Johnson set to huddle with Indiana Republicans amid redistricting fight - Politico
articles.description: The meeting is an escalation of the speaker's involvement.
articles.content:
A spokesperson for Johnson did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
POLITICO reported last week that Johnson called GOP Indiana Senate President Pro Tempore Rodric Bray last Wednesday, … [+811 chars]
